translation: If the embodied one meets death when Sattva is predominant, then they attain the spotless worlds of the knowers of the Highest.
commentary: 14.14 When when? Sattva in Sattva? Pravrddhe having become predominant? You verily? doomsday death? Yati meets? embodied the embodied one? Then then? Uttamavidam of the knowers of the Highest? Lokan to the worlds? Amalan of the spotless? pratipadyate (he) attains.Commentary Lokan Amalan Sptless worlds Brahmaloka and the like where Rajas and Tamas never predominate.The Highest Deities such as Hiranyagarbha.
